Snippet.Name: index
Snippet.Text: SELECT s.NAME as SCHEMA_NAME, t.NAME AS OBJ_NAME, t.type_desc as OBJ_TYPE, i.type_desc, i.name as indexName, p.data_compression_desc, sum(p.rows) as RowCounts, sum(a.total_pages) as TotalPages, --sum(a.used_pages) as UsedPages, --sum(a.data_pages) as DataPages, (sum(a.total_pages) * 8) / 1024 as TotalSpaceMB, --(sum(a.used_pages) * 8) / 1024 as UsedSpaceMB, --(sum(a.data_pages) * 8) / 1024 as DataSpaceMB i.allow_row_locks, i.allow_page_locks, i.is_disabled FROM sys.objects t INNER JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.SCHEMA_ID = s.SCHEMA_ID INNER JOIN sys.indexes i ON t.OBJECT_ID = i.object_id INNER JOIN sys.partitions p ON i.object_id = p.OBJECT_ID AND i.index_id = p.index_id INNER JOIN sys.allocation_units a ON p.partition_id = a.container_id WHERE --t.NAME NOT LIKE 'dt%' t.NAME = '%CARET%' -- and TotalSpaceMB > 10000 -- and i.OBJECT_ID > 255 -- AND data_compression_desc='NONE' --AND i.index_id <= 1 GROUP BY s.NAME, t.NAME, t.type_desc, i.object_id, i.index_id, i.name, i.type_desc, p.data_compression_desc, i.allow_row_locks, i.allow_page_locks,i.is_disabled --HAVING (sum(a.total_pages) * 8) / 1024 > 10000 ORDER BY sum(a.total_pages) DESC ;
